author: kenney
msg: Also check M2_HOME envvar - the most commonly used way to specify a maven version on the commandline.

author: angela
msg: JCR-999  SPI: provide batch read functionality -> add missing method

author: agilliland
msg: simplifying subscription management UI.  We no longer let users hack away at the details of a subscription because there should be no need, the details come from the feed itself.  So now we simply let users add and remove subscriptions to groups by entering in feed urls and everything else is done for them.

We also get the added bonus of having newly added subscriptions being fetched when they are added rather than at some undertermined amount of time afterwards, so setting up new planets and groups can happen instantaneously now.
